item.title: Add Folder to System Path
item.description: These are the Windows 10 instructions. Different operating systems, including older versions of Windows act slightly differently.

item.title: Installing Git
item.description: Windows Instructions These instructions are for installing Git along with Git Extensions, a nice GUI for working with repositories.

item.title: Suggested Drawing and Modeling Software
item.description: Drawing Software Title Description Availability [Inkscape][[Inkscape]] Recommended. Open source, cross-platform drawing program that can produce vector drawings in many formats https://inkscape.

item.title: Using the ASU Library Proxy
item.description: Introduction Accessing journal and conference papers off-campus can be a chore, made more difficult by having to use VPN’s or navigate ASU Library’s search tool.
